name: Viego
title: The Ruined King
shortBio: Once ruler of a long-lost kingdom, Viego perished over a thousand years ago when his attempt to bring his wife back from the dead triggered the magical catastrophe known as the Ruination. Transformed into a powerful, unliving specter tortured by an obsessive longing for his centuries-dead queen, Viego now stands as the Ruined King, controlling the deadly Harrowings as he scours Runeterra for anything that might one day restore her, and destroying all in his path as the Black Mist pours endlessly from his cruel, broken heart.

skins.name: Lunar Beast Viego

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Lunar Beast 2021 event.

skins.description: Former leader of a past Lunar Ox Squad, Viego decided that they would fight the Lunar Beast and actually defeat it. His plan ended in tragedy as he watched the rest of his squad be devoured-- including his wife. Viego has stewed in bitterness over these losses for years, blaming everyone but himself -- including this year's Lunar Ox Squad.

skins.name: Dissonance of Pentakill Viego

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

skins.description: Only the broken-hearted can know the true sound of grief, that yearning for perfection that goes unheard by all others. Viego exists in a world of ashes and shadow, when it ought to be filled with light, and now looks beyond these grey horizons for new sounds and visions to make it so...

skins.name: EDG Viego

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during MSI 2022.

skins.description: Honoring Jiejie's winning performance as Viego during the 2021 World Championship.

skins.name: King Viego

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

skins.description: The heir of Camavor, wielder of the Blade of the King, Viego longs to follow in his father's footsteps. To his advisor Kalista, his doubts were clear long before his coronation, as whispers of the sword's bond echoed throughout the Sanctum of Judgement. But he wears the Argent Crown, and with his blade, Sanctity, Viego will strike fear into the enemies of his nation.

skins.name: Soul Fighter Viego

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2023 Soul Fighter event.

skins.description: The gracious—if needlessly reclusive—host of the Tournament of Souls welcomes all to his arena! Look at him now, eyeing the competition from his throne room high above the ring! Doesn't his solitude just make ya sad, folks? Here's hoping he hops down from that tower and turns that sorrow into UNBRIDLED RAGE! Viiiiieeeeeeegoooooo!

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.
This chroma was released as an exclusive to the Unlocked bundle in 2024.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2024 event.

passive.name: Sovereign's Domination
passive.description: Enemies who fall before Viego become wraiths. By attacking a wraith, Viego temporarily seizes control of the dead enemy's body, healing for a percentage of his target's max health and gaining access to their basic abilities and items. He replaces their Ultimate with a free cast of his own.

spells.name: Blade of the Ruined King
spells.description:
Viego's spectral blade passively deals bonus percent current Health damage On-Hit and strikes twice vs. enemies he recently hit with an Ability, stealing Health.

Viego can activate this Ability to thrust his zweihander forward, impaling enemies in front of him.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Passive: Viego's Attacks deal an additional @TotalPercentHealthOnHit@ current Health physical damage. His first Attack against an enemy he has recently damaged with an Ability hits a second time, dealing @SecondAttackDamage@ physical damage and restoring @HealModVsChamps*100@% of damage dealt as Health. These bonuses are kept during Possession.

Active: Viego stabs forward, dealing @TotalDamage@ physical damage.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Spectral Maw
spells.description: Viego charges up before dashing forward, releasing a ball of concentrated Black Mist that stuns the first enemy hit.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Begin Charging: Viego begins gathering Mist, Slowing himself by @SelfSlowPercent*100@%.

Release: Viego dashes forward and hurls the gathered Mist. Deals @TotalDamage@ magic damage and Stuns the first enemy hit for @Stunduration@ to @MaxStunTT@ seconds based on charge time.
@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Harrowed Path
spells.description: Viego commands the Black Mist to haunt and surround a piece of terrain. Viego can hide in the Mist as a wraith, gaining camouflage, Move Speed, and Attack Speed.
spells.dynamicDescription: Viego sends forth a spectre to haunt the first terrain hit, surrounding it with Mist for @MistDuration@ seconds. Viego gains <keywordStealth>Camouflage</keywordStealth>, <speed>@TotalMoveSpeed@ Move Speed</speed>, and <attackSpeed>@AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed</attackSpeed> while inside the Mist.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Heartbreaker
spells.description: Viego teleports to a nearby location and executes an enemy champion on arrival, piercing their heart and causing a destructive shockwave around them that knocks away their allies.
spells.dynamicDescription: Viego discards any souls he is currently <keywordMajor>Possessing</keywordMajor> and teleports. On arrival he Attacks the champion with the lowest percent Health, briefly <status>Slowing</status> them by @SlowPercent*100@% and dealing <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ + @TotalPercentHealth@% missing Health physical damage</physicalDamage>. Other nearby enemies are <status>Knocked Back</status> and take <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ physical damage</physicalDamage>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
